long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Battle Wheels is an exciting Chrome Extension game that challenges you to stack blocks as high as possible. The objective of the game is to carefully position and stack the blocks, creating a tower that reaches great heights. As you progress, the difficulty increases, testing your precision and timing skills. The goal is to build the tallest tower without letting it collapse. You can enjoy this addictive game for free on the website https://classroom-6x.org/. Test your stacking abilities, beat your high score, and see how tall you can build your tower in the thrilling game of "Battle Wheels"!

*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x, Poki Unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://classroom-6x.org/, https://poki.ee/
